template.description: Creates a property file stencil, validates it and then only plugs it in target slot.

params_description.param0: Set as simple propert, the value will be put in file after plug
params_description.param1: destination slot path (where the stencil created will be plugged in - relative to action)
params_description.param2: key type (none or string, int, uniquefor unicity - default : none)
params_description.param3: initial key value (default 1 for int, "a" for string)
params_description.param4: initial parameter for constructor if needed
